column7: Lenovo ThinkPad T480s: Business-Ready.  With the new 8th generation Intel Core i5 processor, the ThinkPad T480s can take you to new heights of productivity. The ThinkPad T480s gives you the power of a desktop PC--with the freedom of a portable laptop. Tested for battle, Built for Success—Anywhere Every ThinkPad laptop undergoes 21 MIL-SPEC tests for reliability and durability, including the ability to survive in hazardous physical and environmental conditions. Practical Yet Secure The ThinkPad T480s has an optional match-on-chip fingerprint reader, anti-spoofing technology that authenticates log-in credentials and helps safeguards your data. Prepare to Be Thunderstruck The ThinkPad T480s includes Intel Thunderbolt 3—the technology that brings lightning-fast Thunderbolt to USB-C at speeds up to 40 Gbps. Connect a cable from your USB-C port to a Thunderbolt 3-enabled device, and get four times the data and twice the video bandwidth of any other port type, while also supplying power. Key Specifications: - Intel Core i5-8250U Processor (6M Cache, up to 3.40 GHz) - Windows 7 Pro 64-bit, Intel UHD 620 Integrated Graphics - 14" IPS WQHD 2560x1440 resolution non-touch, matte anti-glare screen - 256GB PCIe, NVMe Solid State Drive - 12GB DDR4 RAM, 2400 MHz - Intel Centrino 8265 AC 2x2 Premium Dual Band WiFi - Bluetooth 4.1, Integrated 720p HD webcam with IR - Stereo speakers, Dual-array microphones - - 6-row backlit keyboard - Biometric Fingerprint Reader - Trusted Platform Module (TPM) chip further encrypts your critical information. - I/O Ports: 4-in-1 reader, 2x USB 3.1 ports (One Always On), 1x USB3.1 Type-C Gen 1 for data/charging/display, 1x USB 3.1 Type-C Gen 2/Intel Thunderbolt 3, Headphone/Mic Combo Jack, HDMI 1.4b, RJ-45 Gigabit LAN Port, Docking connection

column7: Think big with a tiny desktop: The compact ThinkCentre M710 Tiny desktop boasts a footprint so small it can fit neatly on a bookshelf, behind a monitor, or even under a desk. Engineered to work in the toughest environments, Tiny can handle anything from minor bumps to extreme temperatures and dusty conditions, so you can focus on growing your business and getting your work done. Tiny Footprint, Big Statement: At 96% smaller than a traditional desktop tower, the M710 Tiny is extremely compact. This tiny desktop fits just about anywhere and can be positioned horizontally or vertically—mount it on a wall, behind a monitor, or even under a desk. You can even power digital signage with a PC that’s easy to hide from view. It delivers reliable, professional-level performance, while freeing up valuable desk-space. The Benefits of Modular Design: With the ThinkCentre M710 Tiny, you can create your own modular all-in-one PC. Simply use the Tiny inside the back of the ThinkCentre Tiny-in-One (TIO) display. Keep costs down when choosing to upgrade the display and computing power separately, and get more use from your assets over time. Packs a Punch: The ThinkCentre M710 features a small footprint yet delivers heavyweight performance. With up to three independent displays, or four displays in Mosaic Mode, this Tiny PC expands the limits of desktop computing to enable greater productivity. Ideal for financial and creative industries—and all your multimedia, multitasking needs. Bigger Isn’t Necessarily Better: Don’t be deceived by its miniature frame, as the ThinkCentre M710 Tiny punches well above its weight. Equipped with a 7th generation Intel Core processor and PCIe SSD storage, you can power up in a flash and load files even faster. Intensive tasks like multimedia creation, graphic design, and number-crunching are a walk in the park. Built for Business—Tested for Your Lifestyle: The ThinkCentre M710 Tiny is built to last in any environment.

column7: Lenovo ThinkPad T480 14" LaptopPower Bridge TechnologyThe ThinkPad T480 features Power Bridge technology, which utilizes a 23 Wh built-in battery in combination with a 23 Whexternal battery. This allows you to swap out a battery and replace it with a fully charged one without having to turn yourmachine off.Thunderbolt 3Thunderbolt 3 is a hardware interface that utilizes the reversible USB Type-C connector. Doubling the speed of itspredecessor, Thunderbolt 3 features a maximum throughput of 40 Gb/s when used with compatible devices. Theconnector also transmits data via USB 3.1 at up to 10 Gb/s, and dual-bandwidth DisplayPort 1.2 allows you to connect upto two 4K displays simultaneously. Additionally, you can daisy chain up to six devices from a single Thunderbolt 3 port.SecurityThe ThinkPad T480 is equipped with a webcam, a fingerprint reader, and TPM security. With Windows Hello, you can easilylog into your system with just a glance or a tap of your finger, even if you forgot your password. Meanwhile, theKensington lock slot and TPM security keeps your device and data protected.

column7: Lenovo ThinkPad T480 14" LaptopPower Bridge TechnologyThe ThinkPad T480 features Power Bridge technology, which utilizes a 23 Wh built-in battery in combination with a 23 Whexternal battery. This allows you to swap out a battery and replace it with a fully charged one without having to turn yourmachine off.Thunderbolt 3Thunderbolt 3 is a hardware interface that utilizes the reversible USB Type-C connector. Doubling the speed of itspredecessor, Thunderbolt 3 features a maximum throughput of 40 Gb/s when used with compatible devices. Theconnector also transmits data via USB 3.1 at up to 10 Gb/s, and dual-bandwidth DisplayPort 1.2 allows you to connect upto two 4K displays simultaneously. Additionally, you can daisy chain up to six devices from a single Thunderbolt 3 port.SecurityThe ThinkPad T480 is equipped with a webcam, a fingerprint reader, and TPM security. With Windows Hello, you can easilylog into your system with just a glance or a tap of your finger, even if you forgot your password. Meanwhile, theKensington lock slot and TPM security keeps your device and data protected.

column7: Lenovo ThinkPad T480 14" LaptopPower Bridge TechnologyThe ThinkPad T480 features Power Bridge technology, which utilizes a 23 Wh built-in battery in combination with a 23 Whexternal battery. This allows you to swap out a battery and replace it with a fully charged one without having to turn yourmachine off.Thunderbolt 3Thunderbolt 3 is a hardware interface that utilizes the reversible USB Type-C connector. Doubling the speed of itspredecessor, Thunderbolt 3 features a maximum throughput of 40 Gb/s when used with compatible devices. Theconnector also transmits data via USB 3.1 at up to 10 Gb/s, and dual-bandwidth DisplayPort 1.2 allows you to connect upto two 4K displays simultaneously. Additionally, you can daisy chain up to six devices from a single Thunderbolt 3 port.SecurityThe ThinkPad T480 is equipped with a webcam, a fingerprint reader, and TPM security. With Windows Hello, you can easilylog into your system with just a glance or a tap of your finger, even if you forgot your password. Meanwhile, theKensington lock slot and TPM security keeps your device and data protected.

column7: The 17.3" IdeaPad 330 Notebook from Lenovo is a well-rounded system capable of handling everyday tasks such as browsing the internet, streaming TV shows and movies, and video chatting with friends and family. Powered by a 2.2 GHz Intel Core i7-8750H hexa-core processor and 16GB of DDR4 RAM, it can efficiently multitask and quickly access frequently used files and programs. For storing your documents, movies, and data, it has a 1TB 5400 rpm hard drive. Should you need more space, you can connect external storage solutions using its multiple USB ports, as well as its 4-in-1 media card reader, which can also be used to quickly transfer files from mobile devices.

column7: Lenovo ThinkPad T470s: Business-Ready.  Light and thin, the ThinkPad T470s is designed to boost productivity, wherever your business takes you. Powered by a high-performance processor and operating system, this rugged laptop boasts an all-day battery life, plenty of storage, and oodles of RAM. All of this, plus the legendary ThinkPad reliability and support. Super Fast SSD Storage Unlike a regular mechanical hard drive, a Solid-State Drive (SSD) has no moving parts and performs faster—including booting up (nearly 3X quicker), opening files (as much as 30% faster), and transferring files (around 200 MB/s, compared to 50-120 MB/s). Tested for Battle, Built for Success Every ThinkPad laptop undergoes 12 stringent military tests and over 200 quality checks. So, you can rest easy knowing that your T470s is more than capable of surviving the bumps and bruises of everyday life. Prepare to Be Thunderstruck The ThinkPad T470s includes Intel Thunderbolt 3—the technology that brings lightning-fast Thunderbolt to USB-C at speeds up to 40 Gbps. Connect a cable from your USB-C port to a Thunderbolt 3-enabled device, and get four times the data and twice the video bandwidth of any other port type, while also supplying power. Key Specifications: - Intel Core i5-6300U Processor (3M Cache, up to 3.00 GHz) - Windows 7 Pro 64-bit - 14" IPS Full HD 1920x1080 resolution non-touch, matte anti-glare screen - 500GB Solid State Drive - 12GB DDR4 RAM, 2400 MHz - Intel Centrino 8265 AC 2x2 Premium Dual Band WiFi - Bluetooth 4.1, Integrated 720p HD webcam - 6-row backlit keyboard - Biometric Fingerprint Reader - Trusted Platform Module (TPM) chip further encrypts your critical information. - I/O Ports: 3x USB 3.1 ports, 1x USB3.1 Type-C for data/charging, Headphone/Mic Combo Jack, HDMI 1.4b, RJ-45 Gigabit LAN Port

column7: Lenovo ThinkPad P51s: Workstation Power Meets Ultrabook Mobility Get the job done with powerful, cutting-edge processing, great battery life, and rugged construction paired with high-resolution video with discrete graphics, multi-port flexibility, and business-class security. All that while being even thinner and lighter than the previous generation. Powerful Processor PC performance has never been faster. Intel 7th Gen Core i processors with built-in security are designed to take your productivity, creativity, and 3D gaming to the next level. So you can get more done right from the start. Vivid Visuals With its advanced architecture and 2GB of GDDR5 VRAM, the ISV-certified NVIDIA Maxwell M520M GPU has the perfect balance of power and battery life - enabling you to be in the field and still get your work done. The extra bright display boasts anti-glare technology and in-plane switching for near-180 degree wide-angle viewing. Add the 720p HD webcam so you can join web conferences and video chats like you're really there. Key Specifications: - Intel Core i7-7600U Processor (4M Cache, up to 3.9 GHz) - Windows 10 Pro 64-bit - 15.6" IPS UHD 4K (3840 x 2160) Non-Touch, Anti-Glare Display - 2TB Solid State Drive - 32GB DDR4 RAM, 2400 MHz - NVIDIA Quadro M520M Discrete Graphics w/ 2GB VRAM - Intel Dual Band Wireless-AC (2x2) 8265, Bluetooth Version 4.1 w/ Intel vPro Technology - 720p HD Webcam with Mic - Stereo Speakers, Fingerprint Reader - Backlit Keyboard with NumberPad and TrackPoint (Pointing Stick) - I/O Ports: USB-C with Intel Thunderbolt3, 3x USB 3.1 ports (1 Always-on charging), HDMI 1.4b , 10/100/1000 Gigabit Ethernet (RJ-45), Headphone/Mic Combo, 4-in-1 Card Reader, Dock Connector / 65-Watt USB Type-C AC-Adapter / 4-Cell Li-Polymer (32Wh) Internal Battery + 6-Cell Li-Ion (48Wh) External (Removable) Battery

Navigate with ease with user-friendly interface of Windows 7 Pro. Includes Windows 10 Pro licensing rights.

column7: ENTERPRISE-READY 14" ULTRABOOK: Feature-rich and feather-light, this Ultrabook boasts the latest processing power; MILSPEC-tested durability; amazing audiovisuals; effortless manageability; and all-day battery life. The well-connected business person likes to travel light, and T460s lets you do just that. Thinner & Lighter: Starting at just 3 lbs and 0.67” (17mm) thick, this laptop is ultraportable. It fits neatly in your backpack, briefcase or tote – it’s perfect for productivity on the go. And with up to 10 hours of battery life, you can go all day without recharging. A New Generation of Performance: PC performance has never been faster. Intel 6th Gen Core i processors with built-in security are designed to take your productivity, creativity, and 3D gaming to the next level. Intel vPro Technology makes enterprise-level manageability even more convenient and efficient. And with Windows 10 Pro you can empower yourself and your business to do great things across many devices securely anywhere, with anyone, and at any time. Fitting a variety of budgets, it's also very easy to use. So you can get more done right from the start. Business-Class Durability & Security: There’s a reason this is the gold standard in business settings. Military-specification tested for ruggedness, durability, and quality against a number of strict parameters means it is ready for anything. Available with fingerprint reader, this laptop allows you the option of biometrics for logging in, so that the swipe of your finger is your password. Intel security features and vPro options step up protection and enhance manageability when deploying upgrades. And a Trusted Platform Module (TPM) chip further encrypts your critical information. Immersive Display & Sound: Configure your laptop with up to a 2560 x 1440 WQHD anti-glare display with In-Plane Switching (IPS), and enjoy a premium visual experience. IPS technology allows for vivid colors and nearly 180-degree viewing angles.

column7: Lenovo ThinkPad T480s: Business-Ready.  With the new 8th generation Intel Core i5 processor, the ThinkPad T480s can take you to new heights of productivity. The ThinkPad T480s gives you the power of a desktop PC--with the freedom of a portable laptop. Tested for battle, Built for Success—Anywhere Every ThinkPad laptop undergoes 21 MIL-SPEC tests for reliability and durability, including the ability to survive in hazardous physical and environmental conditions. Practical Yet Secure The ThinkPad T480s has an optional match-on-chip fingerprint reader, anti-spoofing technology that authenticates log-in credentials and helps safeguards your data. Prepare to Be Thunderstruck The ThinkPad T480s includes Intel Thunderbolt 3—the technology that brings lightning-fast Thunderbolt to USB-C at speeds up to 40 Gbps. Connect a cable from your USB-C port to a Thunderbolt 3-enabled device, and get four times the data and twice the video bandwidth of any other port type, while also supplying power. Key Specifications: - Intel Core i5-8250U Processor (6M Cache, up to 3.40 GHz) - Windows 10 Pro 64-bit, Intel UHD 620 Integrated Graphics - 14" IPS WQHD 2560x1440 resolution non-touch, matte anti-glare screen - 2TB SATA M.2 Solid State Drive - 12GB DDR4 RAM, 2400 MHz - Intel Centrino 8265 AC 2x2 Premium Dual Band WiFi - Bluetooth 4.1, Integrated 720p HD webcam with IR - Stereo speakers, Dual-array microphones - - 6-row backlit keyboard - Biometric Fingerprint Reader - Trusted Platform Module (TPM) chip further encrypts your critical information. - I/O Ports: 4-in-1 reader, 2x USB 3.1 ports (One Always On), 1x USB3.1 Type-C Gen 1 for data/charging/display, 1x USB 3.1 Type-C Gen 2/Intel Thunderbolt 3, Headphone/Mic Combo Jack, HDMI 1.4b, RJ-45 Gigabit LAN Port, Docking connection

column3: Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Carbon 3rd Generation (20BS) 2015 Premium Business Ultrabook - Core i5-5200U, 128GB SSD, 4GB RAM, 14.0" FHD (1920x1080) Display, AC WiFi, Backlit Keyboard, Windows 8.1 Professional
column7: Professional redefined. Introducing the New X1 Carbon - our 3rd iteration of the popular Carbon Series incorporates feedback from users - like you. We've taken the best of the past, and incorporated essential technologies of today to bring you a system with legendary usability and uncompromising performance GO LIGHTER - Without saying too much, it's simply the thinnest ThinkPad ever built. But don't let its ultra-slim profile fool you - the ThinkPad X1 Carbon is one of the most powerful fighters in its lightweight class GO BRIGHTER - With the New X1 Carbon, you're getting a stunning Full HD display featuring practical anti-glare technology for crisper text and brighter images - so you can work longer, and focus better, without the eye strain. And, with optional multitouch technology, you'll discover new and more intuitive ways to interact with your device GO LONGER - You don't have time to stop for a charge between all those back-to-back meetings, and we've kicked up the battery life on this year's model to help make sure you don't have to. But when you do finally run low, those pit stops will be brief with the X1 Carbon's exclusive RapidCharge battery technology KEY SPECIFICATIONS - 5th Gen Intel Core i5-5200U Processor (3M Cache, Up to 2.70 GHz) - Windows 8.1 Pro 64-bit - Intel HD 5500 Graphics - 14.0" FHD (1920x1080) Display. Anti-glare - 4GB DDR3 memory, 128GB SSD storage - Intel Centrino 7265 AC 2x2 Premium Dual Band WiFi - Bluetooth 4.0 - Integrated (720p HD) webcam - Fingerprint Reader - Dolby Home Theatre v4 audio enhancement ; stereo speakers - Best-in-class 6-row keyboard, backlit - Starting at 2.877 lbs, 0.70" thin - I/O Ports: 2 USB 3.0 ports, Headphone/Mic Combo, OneLink Dock port, HDMI, Mini DP, Ethernet extension connection

column7: Lenovo ThinkPad P71: Redefining Power in a 17.3" Mobile Workstation The ThinkPad P71 is your mobile option for true, workstation-level performance. From 3D rendering to enhanced multitasking, the P71 gives you the power you need. What's more, it's ISV-certified with over 100 apps, and features an expansive selection of ports. Powerful Processor Enhanced processors deliver the performance to increase productivity for your business. You can multitask quickly, move effortlessly between applications, and collaborate wirelessly in a high quality videoconference — all with the convenience of longer battery life. Plus, you can guard against identity theft and ensure safe access to your network with built-in security features. Award-Winning Keyboard Full sized and spill-resistant, the ThinkPad keyboard is renowned for its full array of keys, excellent feel, and TrackPoint pointing device. column3: Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Carbon 3rd Generation 2015 Business Ultrabook - Core i5-5200U, 128GB SSD, 4GB RAM, Anti-glare 14.0" Full HD (1920x1080) Display, 720p HD Webcam, Intel AC-7265 WiFi, Bluetooth, Fingerprint Reader, Backlit Keyboard, Windows 7 Pro
column7: Professional redefined. Introducing the New X1 Carbon - our 3rd iteration of the popular Carbon Series incorporates feedback from users - like you. We've taken the best of the past, and incorporated essential technologies of today to bring you a system with legendary usability and uncompromising performance GO LIGHTER - Without saying too much, it's simply the thinnest ThinkPad ever built. But don't let its ultra-slim profile fool you - the ThinkPad X1 Carbon is one of the most powerful fighters in its lightweight class GO BRIGHTER - With the New X1 Carbon, you're getting a stunning Full HD display featuring practical anti-glare technology for crisper text and brighter images - so you can work longer, and focus better, without the eye strain. And, with optional multitouch technology, you'll discover new and more intuitive ways to interact with your device GO LONGER - You don't have time to stop for a charge between all those back-to-back meetings, and we've kicked up the battery life on this year's model to help make sure you don't have to. But when you do finally run low, those pit stops will be brief with the X1 Carbon's exclusive RapidCharge battery technology KEY SPECIFICATIONS - 5th Gen Intel Core i5-5200U Processor (3M Cache, Up to 2.70 GHz) - Windows 7 Pro 64-bit - Intel HD 5500 Graphics - 14.0" FHD (1920x1080) Display. Anti-glare - 4GB DDR3 memory, 128GB SSD storage - Intel Centrino 7265 AC 2x2 Premium Dual Band WiFi - Bluetooth 4.0 - Integrated (720p HD) webcam - Fingerprint Reader - Dolby Home Theatre v4 audio enhancement ; stereo speakers - Best-in-class 6-row keyboard, backlit - Starting at 2.877 lbs, 0.70" thin - I/O Ports: 2 USB 3.0 ports, Headphone/Mic Combo, OneLink Dock port, HDMI, Mini DP, Ethernet extension connection

column7: YOU TAKE AIM AT THE BOUNDARIES, WE'LL HELP YOU BREAK THROUGH.Whether you're an overachiever or an up-and-comer, ThinkPad laptops are the tools you need. From the thin-and-light wonder to the heavy-duty mobile workstation, they're built, tested and enhanced for reliability, durability and speed.TORTURE-TESTEDBaked, battered, blistered.ThinkPad notebooks endure a lot before they ever reach you. We meticulously design many of them to pass rugged military spec tests. We outfit them with spill-resistant keyboards, roll-cage technology and shock-mounted hard drives. And we test them in ways you can't imagine - baking, battering, blistering and blowing them with sand.

column7: Enjoy fast mobile computing while on the go with the Lenovo ThinkPad R400 notebook! Powered by an Intel Core 2 Duo P8400 2.26 GHz processor and 2 GB of DDR2 RAM, the ThinkPad R400 gives you enough power to get things done quickly and easily. The 160 GB hard drive provides plenty of storage space for documents and the operating system of your choice. Access data, burn CDs and watch DVDs with the CDRW/DVD drive. The 14.1-inch widescreen display is perfect for viewing DVD movies and other digital content. Connect to the Internet via integrated Gigabit Ethernet LAN or 56K modem. Enjoy wireless Internet access at home, office, hotel, or at the airport with integrated 802.11a/b/g Wireless LAN! The ThinkPad R400 also has USB 2.0, FireWire, VGA and audio ports that provides plenty of connectivity for printers, digital cameras, flash drives and other external devices!

column7: In raw performance, the Lenovo ThinkPad W530 is a class apart combining the power of a workstation with the portability of a laptop. The ThinkPad W530 offers a wide choice of the latest 3rd generation Intel Core processors in for those who want more done in a day with great precision and quality. NVIDIA Quadro graphics with NVIDIA Optimus technology for optimized graphics performance and long battery life. Large capacity HDD of up to 1TB and SSD of up to 256GB increase storage capability and provide fast performance.  The ThinkPad W530 is fully equipped to work out of the box with ISV certifications for CATIA, SolidWorks, AutoCAD, Inventor, 3Ds Max, Maya, Revit, Pro/E, Creo, and more! The ThinkPad precision backlit keyboard, Dolby Home Theater v4 sound system, Full HD screen with 95% color gamut and wide viewing angle provide the best operational experience. The integrated color calibrator enhances the viewing experience with vibrant true color consistency. The ThinkPad W530 is the best in performance, graphics, user experience, and usability - designed for those who need the power to out do. 15.6 FHD (1920 x 1080) LED Backlit Display with anti-glare NVIDIA Quadro K1000M Graphics and integrated Intel HD Graphics 4000 with NVIDIA Optimus Technology (auto-switch) DVD+-R/RW Dual Layer Drive Intel Centrino Advanced-N 6205 802.11a/b/g/n Bluetooth 4.0 Optional Wireless Broadband upgradeable (WWAN) 10/100/1000 Gigabit Ethernet LAN ExpressCard/34 Slot Integrated HD720p Camera 4-in-1 Media Card Reader MMC, SD, SDHC, SDXC Spill-resistant Keyboard, Multi-touch Touchpad UltraNav, and Trackpoint Connections - 2 x USB 3.0, 2 x USB 2.0, VGA, Mini DisplayPort, FireWire, RJ-45 (LAN), Combo Audio/Mic Jack Approximate Unit Dimensions - 14.7 (W) x 9.7 (D) x 1.25 - 1.40 (H) inches Approximate Unit Weight - 6.19 pounds

column7: From the makers of the award-winning ThinkPad notebook, the Lenovo G530 notebook is a stylish widescreen notebook combining excellent features at a great price. The full-featured, widescreen Lenovo G530 notebook provides not only the functionality to run a small business but also the features to enjoy computing at home. The new Lenovo G530 notebook comes with a 15.4" widescreen with Windows Vista Home Basic preloaded operating system. It's powered by an Intel Pentium Dual-Core Processor T3400 with plenty of memory and storage to handle all your everyday computing needs. Complete Connectivity: Download and save photos, music and other media with the 4-in-1 media card reader. The Lenovo G530 notebook offers four side accessible, high-speed USB 2.0 ports as well as VGA, RJ11 and RJ45 connections. These provide broad compatibility with many consumer devices such as digital cameras, digital camcorders, USB storage devices, game controllers, MP3 players and more. The new Lenovo G530 notebook offers a standard ExpressCard/54 slot to support the latest high performance, high bandwidth peripherals like a mobile broadband card. Preloaded Software Tools: The Lenovo G530 is loaded with a comprehensive suite of preloaded software to help you maximize your productivity, including: ThinkVantage Rescue and Recovery 4.21,Product Recovery, ThinkVantage Access Connections 5.02, Presentation Director, Adobe Acrobat Reader, Sun JRE,Roxio Creator Small Business Edition (Record Now & DLA),Intervideo WinDVD Legendary Keyboard: The same engineers that brought you the legendary keyboard design on ThinkPad notebooks now give you great tactile feel with intelligent layout and performance on other Lenovo notebooks. Thoughtfully designed, the keyboard has specialized keys and buttons for easy access to the Presentation Director application and LenovoCareSM tools, as well as multimedia controls for stop, play, forward, rewind and pause.

column7: Expand your horizons with the Lenovo IdeaPad 5i Pro laptop! We engineered this 16-inch laptop for cord-cutters and entertainers who demand mind-blowing visuals and powerful performance. Powered by an 11th Generation Intel® Core™ processor, its massive QHD display explodes with color and widens your perspective! The 16:10 2.5K (2560 x 1600) IPS screen is bright and vibrant, while the 4-side narrow bezels make the most of your display's real estate, minimizing clutter and distractions. Inside, you'll find unconstrained performance delivered by the Intel® Core™ i5-11300H processor, 16GB DDR4 memory, and NVIDIA® GeForce® MX450 discrete graphics. This professional laptop gives you the power to be productive and to play, with up to 10 hours* of battery life enhanced by Rapid Charge Express – a 15-minute charge giving you three additional hours! Simplify your life with Smart Login, a facial recognition system powered by the IdeaPad 5i Pro's infrared camera. Thin and light at only 4.4 lbs, this Windows laptop has the quietest, coolest blades with possibly the largest fan in a mainstream ultraslim computer. We've designed the fan to optimize cooling and airflow, helping the 5i Pro laptop break the boundaries of performance. Enjoy breathtaking sounds that come to life with Dolby Atmos® over dual speakers, taking streaming video and gaming to a new level. Plus, you can count on the bouncier feel of soft-landing switches via the improved keyboard precisely engineered for tactile control and keying accuracy. Stay connected with WiFi 6 (2x2 802.11 ax), Bluetooth® 5, USB Type-C™ (full-function + Thunderbolt™ 4.0), USB-C (PD + USB 2.0), 2 x USB 3.2 Type-A, HDMI™, SD card reader, and an audio jack.* Actual battery life will vary and depends on many factors such as product configuration and usage, software use, wireless functionality, power management settings, and screen brightness.

column6:
CHROME OS, SPEEDY – SIMPLE – SECURE: Instead of Microsoft Windows, it runs on Chrome OS, an operating system by Google with built-in protection and automatic updates. Bootup takes seconds and it continues to stay fast over time. Chrome makes creating, editing, sharing, and collaboration easy. The Google security H1 chip, fingerprint reader, and webcam physical shutter prevent unwanted access and protect your privacy.
WITH THE GOOGLE PLAY STORE, you can access millions of apps, games, music, movies, TV, books, magazines, and more. All the apps you love on your phone are now available on your computer. You also can edit, download, and convert Microsoft Office files in Google Docs, Sheets and Slides. Or you can use Microsoft Office Web or install the Microsoft Office mobile apps to use in offline mode. (Subscription Required)
POWER, STYLE, AND THINKPAD TOUGH: With the Quad Core AMD Ryzen 5 Pro Processor, this premium C13 Chromebook delivers powerful performance in a sleek and durable aluminum chassis. Narrow bezels provide a larger viewable screen. Tested against 12 military-grade requirements and more than 200 quality checks, from the Arctic wilderness to desert dust storms, from zero-gravity to spills and drops, you can trust this laptop to handle whatever life throws your way. (MIL-STD-810G military test passed.)
IDEAL FOR ANYONE WORKING REMOTELY, on-the-go, or in public-facing positions. With up to 12.5 hours battery life, this versatile business notebook can keep up with a full day’s worth of multitasking. The included USI pen lets you sketch, take notes, capture ideas, and interact with programs and apps with precision and is easily stored in the Chromebook for your convenience. 2-in-1 convertible design, thin and lightweight.
ALL THE RIGHT CONNECTIONS: Speedy WiFi 6 lets you jump on crowded public platforms fast. And with ports aplenty, including four USB ports, you can keep connected to what matters most, no matter where you are. In addition to front facing HD webcam, a 5MP world-facing camera located on the keyboard side allows you to fold back the device into tablet mode and use the screen to see what you're recording.

column7: Engineered for long-lasting performance with a purpose, the Lenovo IdeaPad 3 delivers powerful performance with the latest AMD Ryzen™ mobile processors with integrated Radeon™ graphics. This Windows laptop is perfect for your everyday tasks, working or learning from home, your favorite entertainment, and much more, with features that you can depend on. The huge 17-inch HD+ (1600 x 900) screen and narrow bezels let you see more of everything, while 2 speakers with Dolby Audio™ deliver crystal-clear sound. Stay in touch with dual microphones and a 720P webcam with a manual privacy shutter; you'll never need to worry about whether you're being watched or still on screen after a video call. Plus, you'll enjoy uncompromised battery life on this thin, lightweight laptop.The IdeaPad 3 17-inch laptop is quieter and cooler with intelligent thermals that ensure air flows out without crossing over the PC's intake vents. You can also calibrate your performance and battery life even further with Q-control, which cycles through three modes to match your performance needs. With this Lenovo laptop, you'll never need compromise on your computer again.

column7: With 10th Gen Intel Core processors with up to 6 cores, the ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 8 is faster than ever no matter the task. Given that it’s certified by Intel for mobile performance, it delivers long-lasting power and productivity when you’re on the go. Enjoy up to 19.5 hours* of battery life. When you do need some juice, Rapid Charge boosts battery life up to 80% in just an hour. With always-on responsiveness, you can wake the ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 8 from sleep in less than a second and be able to browse the web a second later. With WiFi 6, you get fast and reliable connections, even on networks with lots of devices attached. Or choose the optional WWAN technology with LTE-A card and jump online with a secure connection just like a smartphone. With the Dolby Atmos Speaker System, the ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 8 includes two upward-firing tweeters and two downward-firing woofers to create an immersive sound experience. What’s more, four 360-degree microphones cancel unwanted noise when you’re on calls, and pick up your voice from across the room—so you can use voice activation to wake your system, play music, and more. Like all ThinkPad laptops, the ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 8 is tested against 12 military-grade requirements and more than 200 quality checks to ensure they run in extreme conditions. From the Arctic wilderness to desert dust storms, from zero gravity to spills and drops, you can trust this laptop to handle whatever life throws your way. Whether you’re watching a video, video-conferencing across the world, or tweaking graphics, the ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 8 features amazing display options. Experience the cinematic 4K Dolby Vision panel with high dynamic range (HDR) technology—intricate details pop while shadows and textures become richer. Choose an FHD touchscreen, also available with PrivacyGuard for screen security.

column7: X Series First-class experience Smaller footprints and epic battery life make X Series the business traveler's trusted companion. Their craftsmanship, versatility and robust security features ensure they're every professional's preference. A lot of Think ThinkPad has been to the top of Mount Everest, the depths of the ocean, and the canopies of rain forests. NASA embraced the ThinkPad on both the International and the Mir Space Stations. It's even in the permanent collection at the Museum of Modern Art in NY. No small wonder then, that we've sold well over 100 million of these reliable devices-thanks in part to loyal X Series customers. Built to go on and on. And on. We test ThinkPads against 12 military-grade requirements and more than 200 quality checks to ensure they run in extreme conditions. From the arctic wilderness to desert dust storms, from zero-gravity to spills and drops, you can trust your X Series device to handle whatever life throws your way. column6:
Quick specs - Lenovo 81FB0005US, Series IdeaPad 330S, Platinum Gray, Windows 10 Home 64-bit, AMD Ryzen 5 2500U 2.0 GHz Boost frequency of 3.6 GHz, 15.6" 1920 x 1080 LCD, 8gb-ddr4, 256GB-SSD, AMD Radeon Vega 8 shared Memory, backlit keyboard, webcam, Windows 10 Home 64-bit, Bluetooth, Dolby Audio
Processor - Ryzen 5 2500U is a 64-bit quad-core mid-range performance x86 mobile microprocessor introduced by AMD in late 2017. This Processor is based on AMD's Zen microarchitecture and is fabricated on a 14 nm process. The 2500U operates at a base frequency of 2 GHz with a TDP of 15 W and a boost frequency of 3.6 GHz
Graphics - the Radeon Vega 8 is an integrated graphics solution by AMD, launched in February 2018. Built on the 14 nm process, and based on the Raven Graphics processor, the device supports DirectX 12.0. The GPU is operating at a frequency of 300 MHz, which can be boosted up to 1100 MHz.
Lcd - featuring high-definition resolution on a wide-angle IPS display edged with razor-thin 5.9 mm bezels, the IdeaPad 330S 15.6" Offers the dynamic experience of a portable home theater. By removing the large bulky bezels, We are able to give you a more immersive gaming and viewing experience.
Audio - with Dolby Audio, the IdeaPad 330S dramatically enhances your entertainment experience. Turn up the volume without distortion you'll hear every detail.

column7: Meet the Idea Pad 330S. Thinner & Lighter with narrow bezels for broader viewing, It boasts state-of-the-art AMD processing and outstanding graphics performance. Power through any task, stream video and create and game with ease. The Idea Pad 330S comes powered by AMD's Ryzen industry-leading processor and graphics, over 4 years and 2 million hours of engineering went into the development of the latest AMD Ryzen 5 processor. Amd combined that technology with the world's most anticipated graphics engines to create the AMD Ryzen accelerated processing unit. Whether you're working or playing, you'll experience optimized power, performance, and speed. Featuring high-definition resolution on a wide-angle IPS display edged with razor-thin 5.9 mm bezels, the Idea Pad 330S 15" Offers the dynamic experience of a portable home theater. By removing the large bulky bezels, we are able to give you a more immersive gaming and viewing experience. Featuring a streamlined chassis with a polished aluminum cover, the Idea Pad 330S 15" Is designed to make an impression. column7: With 10th Gen Intel Core processors with up to 6 cores, the ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 8 is faster than ever no matter the task.  Given that it’s certified by Intel for mobile performance, it delivers long-lasting power and productivity when you’re on the go. Enjoy up to 19.5 hours* of battery life. When you do need some juice, Rapid Charge boosts battery life up to 80% in just an hour. With always-on responsiveness, you can wake the ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 8 from sleep in less than a second and be able to browse the web a second later. With WiFi 6, you get fast and reliable connections, even on networks with lots of devices attached. Or choose the optional WWAN technology with LTE-A card and jump online with a secure connection just like a smartphone. With the Dolby Atmos Speaker System, the ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 8 includes two upward-firing tweeters and two downward-firing woofers to create an immersive sound experience. What’s more, four 360-degree microphones cancel unwanted noise when you’re on calls, and pick up your voice from across the room—so you can use voice activation to wake your system, play music, and more. Like all ThinkPad laptops, the ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 8 is tested against 12 military-grade requirements and more than 200 quality checks to ensure they run in extreme conditions. From the Arctic wilderness to desert dust storms, from zero gravity to spills and drops, you can trust this laptop to handle whatever life throws your way. Whether you’re watching a video, video-conferencing across the world, or tweaking graphics, the ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 8 features amazing display options. Experience the cinematic 4K Dolby Vision panel with high dynamic range (HDR) technology—intricate details pop while shadows and textures become richer. Choose an FHD touchscreen, also available with PrivacyGuard for screen security.

column7: Polished in premium aluminum and sleeker than ever, The Lenovo Idea Pad 730S is our thinnest idea Pad notebook yet. At less than a half inch thin, you'll be amazed at how slim and lightweight it is, while sacrificing none of the power and quality that you want in a PC laptop. Featuring the latest Intel processing, a full HD clarity screen with Dolby Vision technology, and the impressive sound of the Dolby Atoms speaker system, The Idea Pad 730S offers a new standard for thin and stylish design. Whether you're an on-the-move traveler who needs a slim and light business laptop to take your work with you as you go or you want the sleekest, most stylish option available, The Idea Pad 730S is here for you. This Windows 10 computer includes the latest generation of Intel Core i5 processing, which represents an enormous increase in performance from previous generations – offering up to a 40% improvement. The powerful battery provides up to 10 hours of battery life, and our rapid charge technology can provide up to 80% battery life with just 1 hour of charging.

column7: Tailor your performance with the Lenovo IdeaPad 3, a 14-inch laptop computer that's perfect for your everyday tasks. Engineered for long-lasting performance, this Windows notebook is powered by a 10th Generation Intel Mobile Processor and delivers features that you can depend on. You can stream your favorite videos on the stunning 14.0" FHD (1920 x 1080) display; narrow bezels on two sides give you plenty of viewing area with less distraction. Two speakers with Dolby Audio™ let you enjoy crystal-clear sound on every video or music file. The IdeaPad 3 lets you experience big-time entertainment in a remarkably thin and light design.This slim laptop is less than 1 inch thick and weighs only 3.3 lbs, so it's easy to take with you to school, work, or the local coffee shop. And with up to 7.5 hours* of battery life, you'll have plenty of time to finish your work or watch your favorite movie. The integrated webcam lets you video chat with your friends and family, while the physical shutter allows you to close your camera when you want, giving you peace of mind and keeping your privacy intact. Connect with WiFi or Bluetooth®; plug in with three USB ports, HDMI™, and more. The 14-inch IdeaPad 3 is the ideal everyday PC for anyone who needs a light, powerful laptop.* All battery life claims are approximate and based on results using the MobileMark® 2014 battery life benchmark test. Actual battery life will vary and depends on many factors such as product configuration and usage, software use, wireless functionality, power management settings, and screen brightness. The maximum capacity of the battery will decrease with time and use.

column7: Take advantage of portable performance with the 14" ThinkPad P14s Gen 1 Laptop from Lenovo. Designed to offer snappy processing for basic computing or more hardware-intense tasks, this laptop boasts a 1.6 GHz Intel Core i5-10310U quad-core CPU and 16GB of DDR4 RAM. A 512GB SSD provides internal storage for important documents, media, and more. Need more space? Connect external drives and other peripherals via a USB 3.2 Gen 1 port or Thunderbolt 3 port, both of which support DisplayPort connections as well as power delivery. Users can also take advantage of a USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A port for wired peripherals. Wireless users can also connect devices using Bluetooth 5.1 connectivity. And, in addition to Wi-Fi 6, the P14s also incorporates an RJ-45 port supporting wired Gigabit Ethernet. Furthermore, this ThinkPad supports 4G WWAN connections, and can be upgraded by users to take advantage of such connectivity.

column7: The 15.6" Idea Pad 330 Notebook from Lenovo is a well-rounded system capable of handling everyday tasks such as browsing the internet, streaming TV shows and movies, and video chatting with friends and family. Powered by a 2.0 GHz AMD Ryzen 5 2500U quad-core processor and 8GB of DDR4 RAM, it can efficiently multitask and quickly access frequently used files and programs. For storing your documents, movies, and data, it has a 1TB 5400 rpm hard drive. Should you need more space, you can connect external storage solutions using its multiple USB ports, as well as its 4-in-1 media card reader, which can also be used to quickly transfer files from mobile devices.

Powered by a 2.2 GHz Intel i7-8750H hexa-core processor and 16GB of DDR4 RAM, it can efficiently multitask and quickly access frequently used files and programs. For storing your documents, movies, and data, it has a 1TB 5400 rpm hard drive. Should you need more space, you can connect external storage solutions using its multiple USB ports, as well as its 4-in-1 media card reader, which can also be used to quickly transfer files from mobile devices.

column13: Lenovo ThinkCentre M720 SFF Tower Desktop ComputerLenovo has built the ThinkCentre M720 SFF with an integrated Intel UHD Graphics 630 chipset, which delivers asharp and clear picture while allowing for multiple displays to be used via its VGA and DisplayPort outputs. If you'dlike to add external storage drives, optical drives, printers, memory card readers, or other peripherals, the M720SFF features four USB 2.0 ports, two USB 3.1 Gen 1 ports, and two USB 3.1 Gen 2 Type-A ports, as well as a singleUSB 3.1 Gen 1 Type-C port for all your connection needs. In terms of accessing networks or the internet, theThinkCentre M720 SFF supports Gigabit Ethernet.For your productivity, Lenovo's ThinkCentre M720 SFF comes with an included USB keyboard and mouse.Furthermore, this desktop tower is also preloaded with a Windows 10 Pro operating system, which provides usefulfeatures like Cortana and Windows Continuum. In addition, your data is encrypted and secured via the M720 SFF'sTrusted Platform Module.USB 3.1 Gen 1USB 3.1 Gen 1 features a maximum throughput of 5 Gb/s. USB 3.1 Gen 1 and USB 3.0 are synonymous.USB 3.1 Gen 2Doubling the speed of its predecessor, USB 3.1 Gen 2 features a maximum throughput of 10 Gb/s when used withcompatible devices.SuperMulti DVD BurnerThe SuperMulti DVD Burner supports a wide variety of optical DVD and CD media, including DVD±RW.2 x DisplayPort | 1 x VGAThe two DisplayPort outputs support resolutions up to 4096 x 2304 @ 60 Hz, while the VGA port supportsresolutions up to 2048 x 1536 @ 50 Hz. Up to three independent displays are supported.Gigabit EthernetThe system uses an integrated Gigabit Ethernet controller for internet access when connected to a router, modem,or network switch.Energy Efficient Power SupplyThe 210W power supply is 85% efficient.
